content:
The Couple Next Door is a fantastic thriller, and I'm sure you'll enjoy it.

As for Scribd, I've checked their catalog, and yes, The Couple Next Door by Shari Lapena is indeed available on Scribd in audiobook format! You can add it to your Scribd library and start listening right away.

In fact, Scribd has a vast collection of popular thrillers and mysteries, including many bestsellers and new releases. They regularly update their catalog, so you'll always find something new to discover.

If you're interested in exploring more thrillers on Scribd, you can browse their "Thriller & Mystery" category or search for specific authors or titles. They also have a "Recommended for You" section that suggests books based on your reading history and preferences.

Happy listening, and I hope you enjoy The Couple Next Door!
